home.title: IME - Industrial Magic Entertainment
home.description:
We are a company with more than 25 years of experience made up of a team of creatives dedicated to designing, manufacturing and creating innovative experiences through our work. 
 We take care of making theming, scenarios, scenery and design of interior and exterior spaces. In addition to developing special effects, electronic works and projections with the best sound and lighting technologies. We also manufacture all kinds of attractions, simulators, animatronics and thematic floats. 
 We are capable of designing and developing any idea, coming to provide services to major brands, shopping centers, entertainment companies, theme parks, television studios and restaurants, being part of the success of different companies in Latin America and the United States.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Our Mission is to support our clients in the process of designing, manufacturing, conceptualizing and theming their ideas. In order to satisfy your needs, desires and expectations through creativity and originality. Making them connect with their audiences in an extraordinary way.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: Our vision is to be the leading company in the Latin American market, taking entertainment and project development to another level, while creating unforgettable experiences through unparalleled work with the highest quality standards, using the latest technologies.
